website_summaries.verdict: Delivers an excellent all-around streaming device, including a good price point and performance level.
pros: Includes support for 4K video resolution streaming
Has both a strong CPU and GPU for the best performance levels
Offers Bluetooth connectivity, so you can use a wireless keyboard if desired
cons: May shut off automatically if it sits idle too long

customer_reviews.title: Great box!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and reliable box, no issues so far - it has kodi preinstalled but you need to download add-ons and to get used to the interface.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replaced older model that died. Wow! What a big difference! So fast, and picks up WiFi at lighting speed! A must have for any TV!
customer_reviews.author: GJC

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love this little box. Don't let the size fool you. I was worried not too long after I got it. It was updating and it bricked on me I got me a USB cable for the flashing new software, and it is back up and running. It is powerful. I have a 500g external hard drive hooked up and room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Dobby

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing noise is periodically played through HDMI interface
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this TV box based on "Amazon's Choice" recommendation. But after I connect it to my display using the HDMI, both the included and my own, some kind of buzzing noise is played on display's speaker every time after about 10 seconds not touching the remote control. The buzzing noise temporarily disappears when I press the remote control. It seems to me the HDMI interface may have a defect. Returned the product and will look for another TV box.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Life

customer_reviews.title: Device was great, just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: As the owner of a small computer repair business and having been around tech nearly my entire life, I can tell you that this is a quality device that will probably meet the needs of a great many people, however, for what I was looking for, this device was not quite what I needed, so I had to return it. That is not to say that the device is bad, not by any means, it simply means that for my needs it was not quite suited for it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...Purchase a different device
customer_reviews.text: This item is clunky at best. The remote does not work very well. If you don't have a wireless kbd/ms to plug into it, then you will really be unhappy with this item. Installing/uninstalling apps does not go as well as it would normally on any other device. The unit often hangs, causing the user to exit from an app entirely and restart it in order to get it working again. One can tell that it is just another hastily programmed piece of plastic that is quite inadequate for the job at hand. The Fire Stick from Amazon is better than this thing, and it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ouate Ze Phaque

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with YouTube TV. Cannot be made to work with YouTube TV, nice paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Picture is really good, the remote control is really small and it is very difficult to hit more than one button at a time. YouTube TV will not work with this unit, even though it says it works with YouTube. I did buy the keypad which was a mistake it is too small and there are no instructions with it so I have to use the remote to turn it on then use the keypad to type. Pick what streaming service you want to use then buy a compatible Fox but make sure it really is compatible oh, I have a $58 coaster for my drinks
customer_reviews.author: Grumpyoldman

customer_reviews.title: Less Than Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: All right, its an OK box, It comes pre-loaded with several apps you may or may not need. The Netflix app leaves a lot to be desired. It loads ok but is difficult if not impossible to to navigate. I realize this is not a new product but they might want to upgrade the remote. I've had several tv boxes but this is one I should have passed on. I couldn't recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Grillman1506

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: The edges are sharp. The remote is impossibly narrow in its aim, and the Bluetooth range is miserable. The interface is clunky, but functional. The power cable is impossibly short, and 2 feet. The HDMI cable felt like it was made of paper, and was to short for me to use, so I don't know if it works. The streaming video often buffers, despite having gigabit internet, with speed tests showing over 500mbps. Probably going to move this to the kids tv, and buy a Nvidia Shield like I should have from the start.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKnight

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my IPTV. It's very user-friendly and never freezes up. I'll be buying another one soon for another room in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this box it was slower than my 3gb ram box. Everything worked and it had a nice layout but it was jus to slow for me considering it was 4gb ram. I was expecting lightning fast and it jus wasn't there. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: A great media box
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with this box. It's a great box. That's why I reorder it. It's streams with no buffing.
customer_reviews.author: lesco

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Says Disney+ is incompatible with this device and when I open the chrome browser to access it that way it, only works as an Android browser and wont let you select desktop view which prevents you from streaming the Disney + content and will just show you a link to the play store that again will NOT install *UPDATE - Also will not install Spectrum TV app and seems to reject most Android apps that I've never had any problems with on ANY other devices in the past!! PASS ON THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Mattpre

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you’re looking to use this regularly....
customer_reviews.text: Poor input integrations. Connected a keyboard and a. It doesn’t register the enter button. Tried multiple keyboards. b. When using a physical keyboard, it doesn’t minimize the screen keyboard which blocks off half of the screen. Completely impractical if trying to type any type of message. c. The cursor is so outrageously inaccurate.. Other issues... Disconnects from WiFi anytime it goes into sleep or shuts off. Struggles to stream tickers.. which was the only reason I wanted a cheap unit.. The only reason I’m not giving it 1 star is the decent price point..
customer_reviews.author: THE CRITIQUE-R

customer_reviews.title: Basic uses, don’t expect too much.
customer_reviews.text: Remote can barely navigate user interface. Some options or buttons just can’t be selected. Even with the mouse pointer. Selecting ‘search’ in Netflix app is impossible, etc. User interface doesn’t support all apps from Google Play store. Pain in the butt to get Disney+. Can play files off the network via vlc and also supports a variety of flash drives and storage devices. A mini keyboard is almost a necessity for this device.
customer_reviews.author: Knut Lovhoiden

customer_reviews.title: works good as a TV box
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a TV box with no delay in processing. Has nice video controls.
customer_reviews.author: David G. McDivitt

customer_reviews.title: Not a good android box
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I purchased this. I wished I hadn't. It is okay for basic Netflix etc. But only has 1 usb3 and 1 USB 2. It seems very sluggish compared to others. I also play games on these boxes. To my surprise running a ps1 emulator is so slow a $20 android box can run that at full speed. I find it hard to believe this is a 2ghz arm core. Look elsewhere for s better box.
customer_reviews.author: MR BUMP

customer_reviews.title: Netflix doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Netflix doesn't work. Ask you to update but the update doesn't work either. No reply from customer support
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wideman

customer_reviews.title: There are better options
customer_reviews.text: If you want a headache and a lot of time wasted with no instructions or support by this. If I could give it -5 stars I would. I bought a different product (FireStick) and couldn’t believe the difference and quality.
customer_reviews.author: BPCRST

customer_reviews.title: Constantly turns off on it's own
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced two boxes (both with the same issue) being that the box randomly turns off after every 20 minutes. I've been told it may be the power supply but it is connected directly to the wall (not using a power strip). Extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: 3 months old and it will no longer connect to my 5ghz wifi network. This renders it useless because 2.4 ghz doesn't have the bandwidth to stream anything but low quality content. Original review: Handles DTS and Dolby decoding great. Has a hacked up UI with no status, nav bar, or recents. Can't set a wallpaper at all. NO support to be found anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: fast android box
customer_reviews.text: nice little fast android box. no buffering. the only downside is that you can't get netflix from the play store and the remote sucks. i knew the remote would suck so i bought one of those blue tooth keyboards which makes up for it and you can go directly to the netflix site to download it. overall its worth the price and i will probably not buy another for a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Efuan Simms

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it it works great. But if your looking to play cod mobile on your tv through this device like I was. It dose not support the game on the playstore. I replaced my firestick with this to run kodi. And it has exceeded my expectations with smoothness and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kortomatik

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price, it will only connect to wi-fi
customer_reviews.text: it will only connect to Wi-Fi, not to land line, so could only watch stuff at standard quality, not 720 or 1080, 4GB DDR3 RAM 32GB ROM RK3328 Bluetooth 4.1 Quad-Core Cortex-A53 64 Bits, should not have any lag, but does.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: RICHDEAF116
customer_reviews.text: LIKE IT GREAT FAST SPEED NETFLIX HULU AMAZON PRIME NEW ANDROLD 8.1 TV BOX IM VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Richard Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good box, does have some concerns.
customer_reviews.text: Playstore does not work on any of the boxes. I bought 2 last year and one in May. All 3 have same issue with google Playstore. Tech support is working with me to resolve issue.
customer_reviews.author: James, Cincinnati, OH

customer_reviews.title: Seller didn't honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Served its purpose, until it died. Contacted the company who repeatedly told me it was a cable issue despite me using working cables from another unit. Once I insisted on a replacement as it was inner warranty, they stopped responding.
customer_reviews.author: J Cook

customer_reviews.title: It plays xCloud - wired great and wireless good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a cheap xCloud client - works like a champ. Just pair your controller, sign into play store, download game pass app, sign in to GPU account and off you go...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Williams

customer_reviews.title: Did not make the cut.
customer_reviews.text: It ran too slow for me and newly updated Android. I ordered various units from different companies and this one did not make the cut!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Garcon

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for a great TV box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a Christmas present. I set it up and it seems to be a decent TV box. I will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: No more cable tv
customer_reviews.text: Has clock on front, very fast, access to apps, settings. Sign-up to google play get Netflix or a free tv app. Good buy...
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Netflix/YouTube tv doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Okay I thought this thing had Netflix that worked. It was installed by default but wont work. Installed another version and that one doesn't work. I think its because the device is default rooted. Don't even try to watch YouTube TV, that doesn't work either. I should've spent the extra money for a name brand...not happy
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Terban

customer_reviews.title: It's great like I said goggle to set up for all great apps
customer_reviews.text: Got it to watch movies& tv shows whenever I want who needs cable& extra bill! Fyi I'm completely completely computer eliterite lmao so either get your goggle on or better know somebody I'm getting better though
customer_reviews.author: Harrison M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I have a fire stick and I wanted more storage, my stick only has the 6GB and newer ones only have 8, so I ordered this product ( T9 Android ) . This product was not user friendly at all . after my ( Tech friend ) played with it he even told me to send it back . ( not worth the aggravation )
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bishop

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I BUY IT, I GET IT, IT WORKED, JUST 2 MONTHS AFTER I PURCHASED IT, I GOT THE NOTICE THAT I SHOULD UPDATE IT, I UPDATED IT. AND NO LONGER SERVED, THE SCREEN REMAINED IN BLACK AND DID NOT WANT TO TURN ON ANOTHER. DOES NOT START. A TRUE WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY. AND THE SELLER DOES NOT APPEAR OR RESPOND TO THE MESSAGES.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a Android TV box
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the only problem I had was AT&T Sports Net app didnt want to work on it because it detected the Android on it is rooted. But I just pull it up in Google Chrome and go to the website.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Works ok.
customer_reviews.text: It works. I'm not in love with it. Seems to stall occassionally. My remote has already had pieces break off.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lorson

customer_reviews.title: Works are expected- update
customer_reviews.text: 7 months later and this device stopped working. It won't come on at all. I tried a different adapter and still nothing
customer_reviews.author: NordS

customer_reviews.title: A quality Android box, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this box running for close to a year streaming my IPTV and I'm very pleased so far. Easy to use, fast, no freezing up issues, and HD quality video streams. As with any such box I'd recommend a hard wire (ethernet) connection for uptimum streaming experience. A great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Horace Roach

customer_reviews.title: Nice fast box.
customer_reviews.text: So far very satisfied. Box just like advertised, and very snappy with quick boot time. The clock on front is a nice feature, but quite useless as it's so small you cant see it from a few feet away. Also the blue light adds to that difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and slow
customer_reviews.text: Box sucks. Slow, does not have quick access to close apps, constantly crashing, Kodi is sluggish,list goes on and on. According to the specs it should far exceed the performance of my fire stick but sadly it does not. I wish I could give this -stars.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Works great, small, fast, affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box, runs great. I have a different box from this so I already know how to work it. We run a tv subscription on this and it works perfect for that. Box is small and thin and great controller. Perfect price, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Is not us you look friendly as other boxes that I have encountered
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that you have to use the mouse to go to the top of the start button unless you make it kind of difficult the mouth doesn't maneuver adequate
customer_reviews.author: chris williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little box. The 4 gigs of ram help my iptv and kodi run flawlessly. Setup is simple and there aren't any playstore restrictions like some android boxes. My only gripe is they didn't include batteries with the remote.
customer_reviews.author: W Kerin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this device is trash. Better off paying for Fire TV Cube or Roku Ultra.
customer_reviews.author: J Barretto

customer_reviews.title: Poor Wi-Fi. Maybe got a bad box
customer_reviews.text: Wi-Fi was poor even 5.0 with in 5 feet of router. All other devices work fine so I know it’s the box. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Returned it in a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use IpTV but speed was not good so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: @mit

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay at 1st. A few months later it stops streaming live content. The chip can't keep up. Not enough power I guess. Gaming console, Nvidia shield tv, Apple tv, fire tv cube is only way to go!
customer_reviews.author: reg

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed !
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the T9 had a older box MX5 figured with the updated chip it would prevent lagging and it's hard to operate with the remote , tried adding a mouse but it wouldn't work . Like I said not impressed not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: pat dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Remote control is disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Great performance but remote control is big disappointment. No button for search, no button to sort or add favorite. If you are buying this device for watching IPTV start looking for another remote.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried voice recognition. Use it for dart app. Works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV Box and I intent to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Shep James

customer_reviews.title: Won't play many file types
customer_reviews.text: This product can't play half of the files I wanted it to. Limited codecs. Don't buy unless you want to spend 10 hours customizing. Better off buying a blu-ray player with auto-update.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Quick with a lot of memory. Shipped in a good time frame. Will be needing another soon
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Android 5 or 6 is better
customer_reviews.text: Android 8 is suck for TV box , I use it for watching movie only alot of trouble to use with mouse ,no drop down menu whenever go back have to closet all application , andtoid 6 is the best for TV box
customer_reviews.author: Anh t nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works great, fast and never crashes.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use voice recognition, nor do I like remote control in these boxes. I usually hook it up to a wireless mouse, works like a charm. I only use it to stream TV apps so I can't judge other technical stuff on it. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIRA SHAHID

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: I really like this box it works awesome anf6for the price what else can you ask for, i hady remote control that stop working and the seller replace it in no time great costumer service
customer_reviews.author: Juan J Belmonte

customer_reviews.title: Really not sure
customer_reviews.text: It has a good review but when I purchase the T9 It was something wrong with the box so I send it back
customer_reviews.author: Neamet Elsayed

customer_reviews.title: Grew
customer_reviews.text: Product is great i bought 3 of them alreday verry good product
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value Works great Expandable Huge bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: karl

customer_reviews.title: Bad items
customer_reviews.text: Bad I use for one day ,then d'not work properly no good
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: If the controller had a keyboard on the back of it, that would make it perfect. I have this box connected to a touchscreen monitor so I can use my GranBoard Darts application and it works flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Stay with a brand you know.
customer_reviews.text: This device is very, very slow. Picture quality leaves a lot to be desired and the sound is inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedTiger

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for about a month now and I love it! Great value and performance
customer_reviews.author: M.I.

customer_reviews.title: more memory than most tv boxes
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use an standard keyboard and mouse for apk downloads from internet. Machine worked right out of the box with no adjustments necessary. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works... Sort of
customer_reviews.text: It works great if you use a Bluetooth keyboard/mouse touchpad combo with this android TV box. the included remote kind of sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly made device that looses connectivity daily, runs slowly and is a genuine disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This device pretty much sucks. Duper slow and it would freeze alot.
customer_reviews.author: tomas Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn’t work. Two boxes and the same problem. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Android T9 Box
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I expected and worked flawlessly. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Especially when paired with a wireless mouse and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: best box ive bought. great price
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this little tv box. it can accept a usb drive. and a mouse works well with it too. comes with netflix hulu and "bdplayer" which is actually kodi preinstalled! google play and aptoide tv are also preinstalled. one of the neat features of this box over a different brand i tried is that it has a clean memory function on the main page
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & Works great
customer_reviews.text: the setup was easy for someone over 40, the manual could be a little more informative on how to program the remote, but all in all it is easy
customer_reviews.author: Harold Bennett

product_meta.title: T9 Android 9.0 TV Box 4GB DDR3 RAM 32GB ROM RK3318 Bluetooth 4.0 Quad-Core Cortex-A53 64 Bits Support Dual WiFi 2.4G/5G 4K 3D Ultra HD H.265
product_meta.description:
EVER EXPRESS T9 TV BOX,Funning Your Leisure Time

Main Features:

● Newest Android 9.0 OS: Very stable Android version, people can easily install or uninstall applications and games.
● CPU:RK3318 Quad-Core cortex-A53 is rapid and stable, it can give you a high-speed feedback and smooth response
● 4G RAM and 32G ROM: games and videos runs smoothly
● Supports 4K x 2K Video: gives you high-quality video experience
● 3D Function:fullly support 3D videos,you can watch 3D movies anytime,just enjoy the""visual feast"" at home.
● H.265：H.265 Hardware decoding can saves 50% of bandwidth resources, you can watch movies fluently.

OS: Android 9.0
CPU: RK3318 Quad-Core Cortex A53 64bit
GPU: Mali-450MP2
ROM: 4GB DDR3
RAM: 32GB EMMC
Power Supply: DC 5V 2A
3D: Hardware 3D graphics acceleration
High Definition video output: 4K*2K
Ethernet:Standard 10/100M, RJ-45
Wireless: 2.4GHz/5GHz
USB host:USB 3.0 and USB 2.0

More Supports:
--VP9-10 Profile-2 up to 4Kx2K 60fps
--H.265 HEVC MP-10 L5.1 up to 4Kx2K 60fps
--Multiple language and multiple format sub-title video support
--Supports JPEG thumbnail, scaling, rotation and transition effec
--Supports *.mkv,*.wmv,*.mpg, *.mpeg, *.dat, *.avi, *.mov, *.iso, *.mp4, *.rm and *.jpg file
--HD MPEG1/2/4,H.264, HD
--AVC/VC-1,RM/RMVB,Xvid/DivX3/4/5/6 ,RealVideo8/9/10
Support Media format:Avi/Rm/Rmvb/Ts/Vob/Mkv/Mov/ISO/wmv/asf/flv/dat/mpg/mpeg
Support Music format:MP3/WMA/AAC/WAV/OGG/AC3/DDP/TrueHD/DTS/DTS/HD/FLAC/APE
Support Photo format:HD JPEG/BMP/GIF/PNG/TIFF

What’s in the box: 
1 x T9 android TV box
1 x US Power adapter
1 x cable
1 x Remote controller(Batteries not included)
1 x User manual
feature_bullets: 【Multifunction and Latest Android 9.0 OS】T9 tv box comes with Android 9.0 operation system, the latest RK3318 Quad-Core Cortex-A53 CPU with Mali-450 MP2 GPU, which make sure the box running stable and smooth to load movies, pictures and games without buffer, no need to wait for wonderful moment. Android 9.0 raises the bar in performance and usability with a slick lag-free interface,more stable.

【4GB RAM + 32GB ROM】T9 Android TV box provides plentiful room 4GB DDR3 RAM 32GB ROM bring quick start for your apps and games. You can download plenty of apps and caches to browse websites, play games and watch movies more smoothly.

【3D+4K & H.265】T9 tv box support 4k and 3D function. H.265 Hardware decoding can saves 50% of bandwidth resources, you can watch movies fluently. The 4K 1080p resolution is 4 times more than full HD, so you can see every detail of the screen is glossy.

【Dual WIFI & BT 4.0】T9 Android TV box supports 2.4G/5GHz dual Wifi, if you like using Wifi ,it exactly match your needs. Stable, Fast and High Quality Wifi signal. And the BT 4.0 allow you use mini keyboard and headset to enjoy the box.

【More convenient operate】T9 tv box are connected through the cable. Two USB port, connect with your mouse and keyboard to help you operate more convenient. Infrared Remote control let you enjoy your wonderful life which the wireless brings to you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars279 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
